summary: Audited auth-related pages. Found vendor login at `pages/beauty/vendor/login/index.js` and vendor register at `pages/beauty/vendor/register/index.js`. No customer-facing login/sign-up pages or dedicated logout routes exist; logout is handled client-side inside menus/layouts. Forgot-password exists but no corresponding login/signup for users. Reported the missing pages list to the user.
current_status: Auth flow still limited to vendor login/register; customer auth pages are absent. Dev server remains running on port 3000 with backend at 8000.
